newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Sino Land says discussing securitisation.
newsitem.headline: Sino Land says discussing securitisation.

text.p: Sino Land Co Ltd on Friday confirmed that it was in preliminary discussions with bankers about securitising the rental income from a major property investment project.

"The company is conducting confidential discussions with its bankers and financial and other professional advisers concerning a possible transaction involving a securitisation of the rental income of one of the investment property projects of the Sino Land group," it said.
"The transaction is likely to necessitate a reorganisation in relation to the corporate ownership structure of the project," it added.
A local newspaper reported this week that Sino Land was considering raising HK$1 billion through the securitisation of the rental income of an investment property.
Shares of Sino Land rose HK$0.15 to HK$8.30 at midday with 14.45 million shares traded.
